data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V. (2015): On the taxonomy of the genus Acronicta (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae). II. A replacement name for Acronicta geminata (Draudt, 1950). Zootaxa 4048 (3): 431-432, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4048.3.6
